attributes.comment:
As a waiting adoptive parent (18 months) I have had to re-submit some of my
adoption petitions and pay the fees two times already. We are committed to
continuing but when we are approached about our experience and the financial
part of adoption (many times by people inquiring to adopt as well), it is hard to
justify the burden and redundancy of the paperwork. The fee increases are quite
substantial (at 66%) and for many adoptive parents this amount is quite
burdensome. With the waiting period being so lengthy,up to 2 years or more
currently (something that cannot be controlled) and the fees continuing to
increase (something that can be controlled), I humbly request you reconsider
raising any of the adoption petition fees. Thank you for your time.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Charleen R. Berg
